name: HomologicalComplex.IsStrictlySupported.isZero
initialProofState:
Œπ : Type u_1
Œπ' : Type u_2
c : ComplexShape Œπ
c' : ComplexShape Œπ'
C : Type u_3
inst‚úù¬π : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_3} C
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroMorphisms C
K : HomologicalComplex C c'
e : c.Embedding c'
self : K.IsStrictlySupported e
i' : Œπ'
hi' : ‚àÄ (i : Œπ), Ne (e.f i) i'
‚ä¢ CategoryTheory.Limits.IsZero (K.X i')
decl:
/-- If `K : HomologicalComplex C c'`, then `K.IsStrictlySupported e` holds for
an embedding `e : c.Embedding c'` of complex shapes if `K.X i'` is zero
wheneverm `i'` is not of the form `e.f i` for some `i`.-/
class IsStrictlySupported : Prop where
  isZero (i' : Œπ') (hi' : ‚àÄ i, e.f i ‚â† i') : IsZero (K.X i')

name: HomologicalComplex.isZero_X_of_isStrictlySupported
initialProofState:
Œπ : Type u_1
Œπ' : Type u_2
c : ComplexShape Œπ
c' : ComplexShape Œπ'
C : Type u_3
inst‚úù¬≤ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_3} C
inst‚úù¬π : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroMorphisms C
K : HomologicalComplex C c'
e : c.Embedding c'
inst‚úù : K.IsStrictlySupported e
i' : Œπ'
hi' : ‚àÄ (i : Œπ), Ne (e.f i) i'
‚ä¢ CategoryTheory.Limits.IsZero (K.X i')
decl:
lemma isZero_X_of_isStrictlySupported [K.IsStrictlySupported e]
    (i' : Œπ') (hi' : ‚àÄ i, e.f i ‚â† i') :
    IsZero (K.X i') :=
  IsStrictlySupported.isZero i' hi'

name: HomologicalComplex.isStrictlySupported_of_iso
initialProofState:
Œπ : Type u_1
Œπ' : Type u_2
c : ComplexShape Œπ
c' : ComplexShape Œπ'
C : Type u_3
inst‚úù¬≤ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_3} C
inst‚úù¬π : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroMorphisms C
K L : HomologicalComplex C c'
e' : CategoryTheory.Iso K L
e : c.Embedding c'
inst‚úù : K.IsStrictlySupported e
‚ä¢ L.IsStrictlySupported e
decl:
include e' in
variable {K L} in
lemma isStrictlySupported_of_iso [K.IsStrictlySupported e] : L.IsStrictlySupported e where
  isZero i' hi' := (K.isZero_X_of_isStrictlySupported e i' hi').of_iso
    ((eval _ _ i').mapIso e'.symm)

/-- If `K : HomologicalComplex C c'`, then `K.IsStrictlySupported e` holds for
an embedding `e : c.Embedding c'` of complex shapes if `K` is exact at `i'`
whenever `i'` is not of the form `e.f i` for some `i`.-/
class IsSupported : Prop where

‚ä¢ K.ExactAt i'
decl:
lemma exactAt_of_isSupported [K.IsSupported e] (i' : Œπ') (hi' : ‚àÄ i, e.f i ‚â† i') :

name: HomologicalComplex.instIsStrictlySupportedOfNat
initialProofState:
Œπ : Type u_1
Œπ' : Type u_2

‚ä¢ HomologicalComplex.IsStrictlySupported 0 e
decl:
instance [HasZeroObject C] : (0 : HomologicalComplex C c').IsStrictlySupported e where

name: HomologicalComplex.isZero_iff_isStrictlySupported_and_isStrictlySupportedOutside
initialProofState:
Œπ : Type u_1
Œπ' : Type u_2
c : ComplexShape Œπ
c' : ComplexShape Œπ'
C : Type u_3
inst‚úù¬π : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_3} C
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroMorphisms C
K : HomologicalComplex C c'
e : c.Embedding c'
‚ä¢ Iff (CategoryTheory.Limits.IsZero K) (And (K.IsStrictlySupported e) (K.IsStrictlySupportedOutside e))
decl:
lemma isZero_iff_isStrictlySupported_and_isStrictlySupportedOutside :
    IsZero K ‚Üî K.IsStrictlySupported e ‚àß K.IsStrictlySupportedOutside e := by
  constructor
  ¬∑ intro hK
    constructor
    all_goals
      constructor
      intros
      exact (eval _ _ _).map_isZero hK
  ¬∑ rintro ‚ü®h‚ÇÅ, h‚ÇÇ‚ü©
    rw [IsZero.iff_id_eq_zero]
    ext n
    apply IsZero.eq_of_src
    by_cases hn : ‚àÉ i, e.f i = n
    ¬∑ obtain ‚ü®i, rfl‚ü© := hn
      exact h‚ÇÇ.isZero i
    ¬∑ exact K.isZero_X_of_isStrictlySupported e _ (by simpa using hn)

name: HomologicalComplex.map_isStrictlySupported
initialProofState:
Œπ : Type u_1
Œπ' : Type u_2
c : ComplexShape Œπ
c' : ComplexShape Œπ'
C : Type u_3
D : Type u_4
inst‚úù‚Åµ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_5, u_3} C
inst‚úù‚Å¥ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_6, u_4} D
inst‚úù¬≥ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroMorphisms C
inst‚úù¬≤ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroMorphisms D
K : HomologicalComplex C c'
F : CategoryTheory.Functor C D
inst‚úù¬π : F.PreservesZeroMorphisms
e : c.Embedding c'
inst‚úù : K.IsStrictlySupported e
‚ä¢ ((F.mapHomologicalComplex c').obj K).IsStrictlySupported e
decl:
instance map_isStrictlySupported [K.IsStrictlySupported e] :
    ((F.mapHomologicalComplex c').obj K).IsStrictlySupported e where
  isZero i' hi' := by
    rw [IsZero.iff_id_eq_zero]
    dsimp
    rw [‚Üê F.map_id, (K.isZero_X_of_isStrictlySupported e i' hi').eq_of_src (ùüô _) 0, F.map_zero]
